portfolio.title: Brass Hex Parts
portfolio.description: Precision-machined brass hex components designed for secure fastening and reliable performance in industrial and engineering applications.

portfolio.title: Brass Special Hex Inserts
portfolio.description: Custom brass hex inserts manufactured with tight tolerances for superior grip, durability, and long service life in plastic and metal assemblies.

portfolio.title: Brass Electrical Terminal Parts
portfolio.description: High-conductivity brass electrical terminal components engineered for safe, efficient, and long-lasting electrical connections.

portfolio.title: Brass Nickel Plated Terminal
portfolio.description: Nickel-plated brass terminals offering excellent corrosion resistance, enhanced conductivity, and extended durability in demanding environments.

portfolio.title: Brass Forging Components
portfolio.description: Robust brass forging components produced for high-strength applications where mechanical reliability and structural integrity are critical.

portfolio.title: Brass Hex Critical 1/8" NPT Thread
portfolio.description: Precision brass hex components with accurate 1/8" NPT threading, ensuring leak-proof sealing and dependable performance in fluid systems.

portfolio.title: Brass Rivets
portfolio.description: High-quality brass rivets designed for permanent fastening applications, offering strength, corrosion resistance, and clean finishing.

portfolio.title: Brass Sensor Temperature Body
portfolio.description: Precision-engineered brass sensor bodies used in temperature and pressure sensing applications, ensuring accurate fit and thermal stability.

portfolio.title: Brass Cross Diamond Knurling Inserts
portfolio.description: Brass inserts with cross diamond knurling for superior pull-out resistance and firm anchoring in molded and machined components.

portfolio.title: Brass Knurling Inserts
portfolio.description: Durable brass knurled inserts manufactured for enhanced grip, dimensional accuracy, and reliable fastening in engineering assemblies.

portfolio.title: Brass Pin
portfolio.description: Precision brass pins produced for alignment, positioning, and fastening applications, offering consistent quality and smooth finishing.
